A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars movies ever. This film has everything that a Star Wars film should have\, action scenes\, lightsaber battles\, awesome characters and an interesting story. In my opinion only Star Wars fans will love it and understand it. If you are not a big fan you will not get the movie and because of that finding it boring. I think this movie is better than The Force Awakens and the prequels.
